QuestData.Title: Little One Lost
QuestData.Description:
I'm ready to go home now, but there are still scary men outside...
Will you stay with me? Make sure they don't take me away?
I don't want to go back in the cage...
QuestData.LogDescription: Escort Korine back to her mother Verene at the Waning Crescent.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh my sweet little Korine! Thank you, thank you!
